Title: Requires landlords to provide tenants with a rent ledger
Summary: Requires landlords to provide tenants with a rent ledger containing a detailed record, including the amount, date and method of payment, of all financial transactions between such lessee and lessor, including rent payments, late fees, and security deposits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring landlords to provide tenants with a rent ledger
